description:
Shikouin is the commander of the http://anidb.net/ch26361 [Sekishoku Ouki], and as such http://anidb.net/ch26296 [Hanaukyou Hokusai]`s personal bodyguard.
She was once the instructor or http://anidb.net/ch26296 [Tsurugi Konoe] and trained this girl for her future task, being http://anidb.net/ch3381 [Tarou]`s Chief of Security. Konoe still addresses Shikouin as "Nee-san".
name: Shikouin
